dek:
As wide-ranging in their practices as they are forward-thinking, these trailblazers are bound by a common goal: 
to reimagine the world as we know it

items.title: __*AD* Innovator: Art Production Fund__
items.caption: The nonprofit organization [Art Production Fund](/story/art-production-fund-ad-innovators-2015-article) brings [A-list installations to the world at large](/gallery/art-production-fund-ad-innovators-2015-slideshow)

items.title: __*AD* Innovator: James Carpenter__
items.caption: Bridging science and sculpture, designer [James Carpenter](/story/james-carpenter-ad-innovators-2015-article) harnesses the sun’s rays to create spaces with extraordinary allure

items.title: __*AD* Innovator: Byan Slat__
items.caption: Whiz kid environmentalist [Boyan Slat](/story/boyan-slat-ocean-cleanup-ad-innovators-2015-article) has hatched a plan to help clean up the oceans
items.credit: Photo courtesy of the Ocean Cleanup

items.title: __*AD* Innovator: Mikyoung Kim__
items.caption: Landscape architect [Mikyoung Kim](/story/mikyoung-kim-ad-innovators-2015-article) conjures joyful, restorative environments that captivate with light, wind, and sound

items.title: __*AD* Innovator: Joseph Grima and Sarah Herda__
items.caption: Curatorial dynamos [Joseph Grima and Sarah Herda](/story/joseph-grima-sarah-herda-ad-innovators-2015-article) draw the best of the global architecture field to Chicago

items.title: __*AD* Innovator: WeWork__
items.caption: With an eye for design and a gift for spontaneity, the shared-office empire [WeWork](/story/wework-ad-innovators-2015) is revolutionizing the way business gets done

items.title: __*AD* Innovator: Frank Jensen__
items.caption: Copenhagen mayor [Frank Jensen](/story/frank-jensen-copenhagen-ad-innovators-2015-article) is out to prove that his city’s ambitious ecological agenda can be a model for the world

items.title: __*AD* Innovator: SelgasCano__
items.caption: Color-happy and wildly inventive, the rising-star architecture firm [SelgasCano](/story/selgascano-ad-innovators-2015-article) ushers in a sophisticated new age of play

items.title: __*AD* Innovator: Max Lamb__
items.caption: Constantly experimenting with styles and materials, [the furnituremaker](/story/max-lamb-ad-innovators-2015-article) teases something incredible out of everything he touches

socialDescription: As wide-ranging in their practices as they are forward-thinking, these trailblazers are bound by a common goal: to reimagine the world as we know it
seoDescription: As wide-ranging in their practices as they are forward-thinking, these trailblazers are bound by a common goal: to reimagine the world as we know it
